text: Nice and peaceful place to enjoy nature and exercise. Do take note that pass the Mandai depot area, there will be no lighting, so plan your activities before the sunset. Good place to cycle also tho, certain part maybe difficult due to the rising slope.

The actual connector is actually quite a short distance but it takes you to different parks which is awesome! The entrance is near the SLE flyover. Nice greenery, would come here again during sun rise cos I believe it would be beautiful. For walking, itâ€™s pretty easy as its pavement all the way.  I walked through the connector and ended up at Mandai and it was only a short few minutes walk to Bird Paradise. Will definitely walk this path again to go to the Mandai park connector and Lower Seletar Reservoir.
Calm and beautiful pathway.most people use this area for exercising and cycling.if you can visit early morning, you can watch Sun Rise, too.
Loved coming here at 6.30am!! You can see mist just before/when he sun comes up ğŸ˜ Wear proper shoes for better grip and proper clothes to protect yourself from the tall grass and buggsss ğŸœğŸ›ğŸ

I try to go here on 6pm eveningï¼Œlol. A bit difficult to find the place. The road was no one it make me creepy and scary when walk alone on around evening 6pm. Maybe next time I woke up in early morning to see the sunrise.
